Entry.JapaneseText: 仕事の前にみんなに挨拶しましょう。 空から降ってきたあなたに みんな興味津々だったみたいだし
Entry.EnglishText: Before we get to work, let's greet everyone. Since you fell from the sky, everyone's curious about you.
Entry.Notes: Needed to be shrinked quite a bit from: (Before we start work, let's go say hello to everyone. Since you fell from the sky, everybody's really curious about you.)
